attributes.action: Freeze funding to the World Health Organization amid the coronavirus crisis
attributes.additional_details: President Donald Trump announced Tuesday at the White House that he would put a hold on funding to the World Health Organization amid the coronavirus crisis: https://www.whitehouse.gov/briefings-statements/president-donald-j-trump-demanding-accountability-world-health-organization/
attributes.background: President Donald Trump has announced a freeze on the funding to the World Health Organisation. He said WHO receives more from the United States than any other country, and would require accounting for their failure to properly alarm the world about the coronavirus outbreak. We should do the same.
